replies.body: Eeeeeeeee I do hope you reported them. Keep in mind that submitting a report doesn't immediately get that person banned, but they will be reviewed and action will be taken depending on what was said and how many reports were sent. If you want to bring it closer to our attention, feel free to take screenshots and shoot us a ticket!
